pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Aware Tibbles // Built on top of the 'tibble' package, 'tibbletime' is an extension that allows for the creation of time aware tibbles. Some immediate advantages of this include: the ability to perform time-based subsetting on tibbles, quickly summarising and aggregating results by time periods, and creating columns that can be used as 'dplyr' time-based groups.
